title: LGT Wealth India appoints Poonam Mirchandani as MD of wealth planning & family solutions division
description: LGT Wealth India has appointed Poonam Mirchandani as the managing director of its wealth planning & family solutions division, effective August 2024. She will focus on advising family business owners, promoters, and high-net-worth individuals, expanding the firm's offerings in succession and estate planning, international wealth management, global mobility, and philanthropy.
